verses.verse: <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of every one of them a <S%H4294>rod<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4294>rods:<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> you every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on his <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> shall be for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3240>lay<s%> them up in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H4294>rod,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> shall <S%H6524>blossom:<s%> and I will make to <S%H7918>cease<s%> from me the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> one of their <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H4294>rod<s%> apiece, for each <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> even <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H4294>rods:<s%> and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>laid<s%> up the <S%H4294>rods<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> was <S%H6524>budded,<s%> and <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6525>buds,<s%> and <S%H6692>bloomed<s%> <S%H6731>blossoms,<s%> and <S%H1580>yielded<s%> <S%H8247>almonds.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>rods<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7725>Bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for a <S%H226>token<s%> against the <S%H4805>rebels;<s%> and you shall <S%H3615>quite<s%> <S%H3615>take<s%> away their <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> from me, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> not.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so: as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> we <S%H1478>die,<s%> we <S%H6>perish,<s%> we <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6>perish.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whoever<s%> <S%H7131>comes<s%> any thing <S%H7138>near<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> shall we be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> with <S%H1478>dying?<s%>
